item.title: IPL betting: Meiyappan, Vindoo voice samples match
item.description: The Mumbai police claimed that the voice sample of the former Chennai Super Kings team principal matched with one tapped in the telephonic conversations where he is purportedly discussing match-fixing details with Vindoo

item.title: BCCI asks IPL-bound players to participate in domestic T20
item.description: For once BCCI put the domestic T20 league ahead of IPL, instructing IPL-contracted cricketers to take part in the tournament

item.title: Hope to convince Kumble on DRS issue: ICC CEO Richardson
item.description: Dave Richardson is hopeful that he can convince Anil Kumble to push for Indiaâ€™s acceptance of the DRS

item.title: Johnson's toe infection spreads to leg
item.description: Mitchell Johnson's injury got worse with the infection spreading to his right leg

item.title: Shillingford to make comeback with tweaked action
item.description: Shillingford was suspended from bowling by the ICC after he was reported to the ICC for suspected illegal actions during the Test series in India last year

item.title: I'm not contesting election, tweets Sehwag
item.description: Sehwag's name came up in the poll fray after the report quoted highly placed sources as saying that the Congress was considering to field the Nawab of Najafgarh from a South Delhi seat

item.title: Unwanted fame for Herschelle Gibbs in Oscar Pistorius trial
item.description: The bat with which Pistorius broke down the bathroom door behind which Steenkamp was hit by bullets prominently featured Herschelle Gibbs' autograph

item.title: IPL 2nd leg could be held in India
item.description: The organizers claim that the state governments want to host the matches once polling for general elections is completed in their areas

item.title: I don't play IPL for making comeback: Gambhir
item.description: Gambhir scored 578 runs in the Ranji Trophy this season with a top score of 153 against Haryana but failed to make the cut for the Test squad to South Africa

item.title: UAE to host 20 matches in IPL first leg
item.description: Defending champions Mumbai Indians take on Kolkata Knight Riders in the IPL-7 opener on April 16 in Abu Dhabi

item.title: Jayawardene, Sangakkara have let me down, says Jayasuriya
item.description: Sri Lanka chief selector Jayasuriya said the veteran players should have made their intentions to retire clear to him before making them public

item.title: Zee rebuts Dhoni's allegations, says moved SC with evidences
item.description: Dhoni had claimed Rs 100 crore damages from the Zee for allegedly telecasting "malicious" news that he was involved in spot -fixing in IPL matches

item.title: Dinda can play Tests for India in future: Waqar
item.description: Dinda, who represented the country in a T20 international against Sri Lanka is yet to earn a Test cap

item.title: Harbhajan to lead North in Deodhar Trophy
item.description: Another player trying to make a comeback to the Indian team, Gautam Gambhir has been named vice captain

item.title: Still have 2-3 years of competitive cricket left in me: Sehwag
item.description: Out-of-favour Virender Sehwag believes he can continue to play competitive cricket for another 2-3 years
